TopicTitle: MechJeb ascent autopilot suddenly not working?

Articles.Content:
Obviously I have mechjeb installed, it's been working fine. Now, for some reason, the ascent autopilot doesn't appear at all then I click the button to make it appear. All the other features of the plugin work, just not the ascent auto pilot.

Anyone have any ideas what the problem is? I have ISA Mapstat plugin installed, took that out, didn't fix anything. Tried different screen resolutions, to see if it was hidden offscreen, no luck there. Heeeeeeeeeeeeelp!
The window position occasionally gets moved off the screen, deleting the MuMechLib folder inside plugindata should reset all of the settings.
